name: Run Bro RUN!
description:
You're stuck in a weird maze, unable to find the way out. Footsteps can be heard, and a scary PNG is right behind you. As the title says, run for your life!

Desc:  
This is the first time I tried to make a 3D game. Though I've been avoiding 3D works, but I must say that the process was fun.

How to play the game:
Immediately run after entering! Use WASD on your keyboard to move around and avoid collision with the PNG. Then, if you want to enable your cursor, holding E will do the trick. Ah, and you can also use your mouse to look around.

Bugs:
I don't know, if there's any please do tell.
